pages.title: Fluid Splitter
pages.text: The <item>Fluid Splitter/$ has two versions: Basic and Redstone. Both split fluids between two outputs (on opposite sides) in a set ratio, and accept fluid from any non-output side. Both versions can output fluids through a line of <item>transport chutes/$.$(br2)

The <item>Basic Fluid Splitter/$ is configured by shift-right-clicking with a <item>$(l:essentials/wrench)wrench/$ to adjust the ratio. It sends a pre-configured ratio of fluid to the non-blue colored output side, and the rest to the blue colored output side. The output ratio is defined as fractions over 12.$(br2)

The <item>Fluid Splitter/$ is controlled by a redstone signal to control the ratio. It sends (redstone strength)/15 of fluid to the non-blue colored output side, and the rest to the blue colored output side.$(br2)
